idea-plugin.name: Search In Repository
idea-plugin.description:
Repository helper plugin


The plugin provides a query tool to search Maven and NPM dependencies info in the IDE

Tool for NPM is coming soon……


Maven:
  • Double-click a row in the Artifact list to query all versions of the Artifact
  • Double-click a version of the Artifact list to query the details of that version
  • Copy the dependency information or click the button

该插件提供一个查询工具方便在IDE中直接搜索Maven和NPM的依赖信息

NPM依赖信息查询功能正在骑马来的路上……


Maven:
  • 双击Artifact列表的某一行查询Artifact所有版本
  • 双击Artifact列表的某一版本查询该版本的详情
  • 直接复制或者点击按钮复制依赖信息

Source Code：Github | Issues
